metadata.title: CVE-2015-2936 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: MediaWiki 1.24.x before 1.24.2, when using PBKDF2 for password hashing,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) viaa long password.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
